item.title: Orforglipron Lowers A1c, Weight in Early Type 2 Diabetes
item.description: Phase 3 data support use of the oral non-peptide small molecule as potential first-line type 2 diabetes treatment, investigator says. Medscape Medical...

item.title: Novel GLP-1 Agonist Promotes Safe and Effective Weight Loss
item.description: More than 90% of patients achieved clinically meaningful weight reduction compared to placebo in a phase 3 trial of ecnoglutide. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Population-Level Weight Loss Seen With Primary Care Protocol

item.title: Stem Cell-Derived Islets Still Producing Insulin at 1 Year

item.title: Smartphone-Based Home Albuminuria Testing Boosts Screening
item.description: A smartphone-based home albuminuria test facilitates screening and early diagnosis of kidney disease in high-risk individuals with metabolic disorders...
